CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 2, 1955, pg. 27 reads: "Dazzling Displays Exhibit Top Products at Fair...8. Beautiful mantelpieces were displayed by the Artcraft Mantel Company. Representatives shown here are John S. Optochen, Bill Faulhaber and Lester Cauffiel...Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: John S. Optochen, Bill Faulhaber, and Lester Cauffiel gathered around faux fireplace in Artcraft Mantel & Mirror Company booth, in Syria Mosque for the 1955 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Advertising--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
